channel.title: Getting-starteds on Light GraphQL 4J - A GraphQL framework built on top of light-4j
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Light GraphQL 4J - A GraphQL framework built on top of light-4j

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: To get started, an easy way is to copy one of the examples and replace the schema with yours. If you compare between the examples, the only difference is schema classes. Here is the link to examples.
